value:
I am...a remnant of the dream realm...
Though it seems I still have some role
to play in this waking world...

Mortals once turned away from their
dreams, and the dream realm was
nearly consumed by nothingness...

My sister, Freyja, is...precious to me.
It is my love for her that drives me
to stop her from harming mortals...

By blowing the horn Gullinkambi,
one can awake from any dream...
if one wishes to...

Nerþuz is...my father's sister... I have
not seen her since I left home, but we
share a fondness for mortals, I recall...

I am Dream-King Freyr... Wishing you
well in pursuit of your dreams, on
behalf of $Nf.

There is...still hope in this world.
My existence here is proof.

War brings only suffering... I cannot
wish such ills upon the world...
Have even I lost sight of the dream?

The potential of a dream is infinite...
One need only believe.

I am Freyr, Dream-King over the
realm of Ljósálfheimr... As long as
mortals dream, I hold to my hopes...

I took children who had been abused
and gave them nectar... All to save
mortal hearts—and the dream realm...$k$pI used the pure hearts of children
to drive back the nothingness...$k$pNow, I cannot say I would make
the same choice...knowing those
children will never again be mortal.$k$pI stole their futures...I regret that.$k$pI do have hope, however... You and
your nature are beyond anything
even we gods have known before...$k$pYou yet may find ways of defending
mortals the gods themselves have
never dreamed...
Ah, humans. So lovely.
Why must we fight?
Come now, and behold!
Your dreams end here.
This, too, is fate...
I am Freyr. To you humans, I am the god of plenty.
Hm? You...need something of me?
It is you, then... So, the prophecy has come to pass...
Though my eyes appear closed, I watch you closely. Within dreams, all things can be seen...
Human life is fleeting. As are dreams...and all things... That is what makes them precious.
Oh, Freyja... Though I love you, I...I cannot...
Humans are radiant with dreams and desires. I can feel them...like the sun's warmth...
Ah, yes.
Guide me.
I understand.
